mapper.select: SELECT oa.id AS id , oa.import_time AS import_time , oa.issue_time AS issue_time , oai.reimbursement_item_id AS salary_item_id , oai.reimbursement_id AS salary_id, oai.col_index as col_index, oai.template_id AS template_id , oai.template_col_name AS template_col_name, oai.import_amount AS import_amount, oai.user_id AS user_id,oai.category as category FROM reimbursement_import oai LEFT JOIN reimbursement oa ON oa.`id` = oai.`reimbursement_id` WHERE oai.`user_id`=#{params.userId} AND oai.`template_id`=#{params.companyId} and oa.issue_time in ( SELECT a.issue_time FROM (SELECT a.`issue_time` AS issue_time FROM reimbursement a LEFT JOIN reimbursement_import b ON a.`id` = b.`reimbursement_id` WHERE b.`user_id`=#{params.userId} ORDER BY a.`issue_time` DESC ) AS a) order by oai.col_index asc

select si.reimbursement_item_id as salaryItemId , si.reimbursement_id as salaryId, si.template_id as templateId , si.template_col_name as templateColName, si.import_amount as importAmount , si.user_id as userId, si.col_index as colIndex, si.category as category from reimbursement_import si left join reimbursement s on si.reimbursement_id = s.id where si.user_id =#{params.userId} and si.reimbursement_id =#{params.salaryId} and DATE_FORMAT(s.issue_time,'%Y%m%d') =#{params.issueTime} order by si.col_index asc
